name: Dark North
description:
The North is a dark and dangerous place, here in the cold forests, the most powerful evil dwells. The only people so strong and seasoned that have been able to resist it for centuries is the kingdom of the Grimm.
One day the King dies without leaving heirs to the throne. The elders decide to follow ancient traditions and find a new ruler among the strongest warriors of the kingdom. They must be able to fight back both humans and monsters.
After difficult tests, two best candidates remain who will decide the fate of the crown in a duel. Go to the cursed forest and find out which of you is worthy to bear the title of King of the North.

Gameplay:
Dark North is a third-person action RPG.
In the best traditions of dark fantasy, you can choose from three playable characters with unique abilities: Archer, Knight, or Mage.
The game has a single player mode for training and multiplayer for two players.
You go to a snowy forest filled with many dangerous monsters with different abilities, power, and benefits for you. By killing these NPCs, you earn certain resources and you can decide which skills you are better get or buffing in the tree of abilities, by this you are building a strategy for the optimal combat system for your character. The strategy can be different every time, considering which NPCs you kill and what you get from them.
If you play with a friend in multiplayer mode, then you are given peace time to improve the characters, when the time is up, fight with your friend.
